title: Club user wants to view an existing 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Place on 60 Day DL transaction already exists for a player
AND user can see the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in the player history
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery
AND clicking grey "Close" button will return user to their entry point into the transaction

title: User wants to create a new 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected 60 Day DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Place on 60-Day DL" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: Check earliest reinstatement calculation
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user enters or changes the Placement Date on the transaction
custom_expected:
THEN the system will calculate and display proper Earliest Reinstatement Date
AND Earliest Reinstatement Date will be on the 61st day after initial placement on the DL, OR 61st day after the Club's Season Start Date, whichever is later

title: Save a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode

title: Submit a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND an entry should be created in green font in players' Player Historyy: Code = DL60J, Description = Place on 60-day DL
AND player's pending major league roster status should be updated to "60-Day DL"

title: BOC user receive an approval item when 60 Day DL tx is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club is attempting to submit a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN transaction reaches a status of "Submitted to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN an approval item should be generated and display on BOC- Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from attachments column of approvals widget
AND any comments should display in the comments column of approvals widget
AND any flags should display in the flags column of the approvals widget
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink will open Player Profile to Player History Tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink will open submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: Reject a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: BOC user approves 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = DL60J Description = Place on 60-day DL, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's Major League Roster status should be set to 60-Day DL

title: Club user receives notification when tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification when tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN 60 Day DL transaction reaches an "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Delete a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player
AND the transaction is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this [Place on 60-Day DL]?"
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the transaction
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted transaction should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: Reverse a 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction

title: Suppress a reversed 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should close form and keep no record, and return user to point of entry
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: Receive error if required fields are missing or violations of on save rules are broken
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to save a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND required fields are missing or on save rules have been broken (according to data discovery)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should check all rules detailed in data discovery
AND system should display proper error for any rules that have been violated

title: User wants to create a new 60 Day DL tx - preliminary or rejected tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Place on 60-Day DL" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to create a new 60 Day DL tx - submitted transaction already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Place on 60-Day DL" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Place on 60-Day DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Place on 60-Day DL" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: Save a 60 Day DL tx - post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND transaction is in a "Post-Approval" state
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN required field and format checks will be made
AND transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode

title: Save a 60 Day DL tx - first time saving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club or BOC user has a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction open in edit mode
AND this transaction has not previously been saved
AND a "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved
AND system should display a successful save blue notification
AND the transaction should be reloaded in view mode
AND transaction status should be set to "Preliminary"

title: Reverse a 60 Day DL tx - not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Cancel creation of or changes to 60 Day DL tx - previously saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is editing a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
AND form has been saved by user previously
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload form in default mode for the transaction state with none of the edits made since last save reflected
AND not confirming cancellation should return user to form and take no action

title: Club user is preventing from creating a tx for a player NOT belonging to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND player's Current Org is different from logged in club user's Org
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Place on 60 Day DL" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: Receive an error creating a tx for a MN league player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND selected player's pending roster (or current if pending unavailable) status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Place on 60 Day DL" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to point of entry

title: Receive an error if placement date precedes last game date on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date is on or before "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button will return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if the last game date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Last Game Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Last Game Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if attempting to place player on DL out of season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls before the start of spring training or after the submitting org's Last Day of Season date (including post season)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player must be placed between the open and closing date of the season, from {Start of Spring training system date} to {Club's last day of season system date}."
AND clicking Back should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC Only)

title: Receive an error is placement date is after roster affected date on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date falls after the Roster Affected Date entered on a transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "DL Placement Date must be on or before Roster Affected date."
AND clicking Back button should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if exam date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if injury date is in the future on tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Injury Date entered on the transaction occurs in the future
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Injury Date must not be a future date."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive warning if exam date on tx is more than 10 days ago
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed DL transaction
AND Exam Date entered on the transaction occured more than 10 days prior (can be equal to 10 days ago)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "Exam Date entered is more than 10 days ago. Please enter the most recent exam date for the player."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Receive an error if player is at the MN league level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND selected player's Pending Roster status is at the Minor League
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Receive an error if tx placement date is back dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if tx placement date is future dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if player does not have a valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not Active or Active Pending Contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Player must be Active, or Active Pending Contract to be placed on the DL."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: Receive an error if player has a pending or approved tx date after entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of <Roster Name Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive an error if injury date is prior to a subsequent assignment to the MN league
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction 
AND player has an approved Major/Minor Outright, Optional Assignment, or accepted Return of Rule 5 Selection transaction with transaction date after the Date of Injury and before the Placement Date.
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Date of injury is prior to subsequent assignment(s) from the Major Leagues."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive a warning if user is placing player on DL and reserve list has fewer than 40 players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND Org that the player belongs to has fewer than 40 players on its Reserve List (including player being placed on DL)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message ""A Major League player cannot be placed on 60-day list unless the player's Major League Club's reserve list contains at least 40 players. Currently it contains {current count} players."
AND clicking Back button should close modal and return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Receive an error if placement date precedes last game date on tx - doubleheader option checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve completed "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
AND entered Placement Date is before "Last Game Date" 
AND doubleheader option is checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "The player cannot be placed on the DL before his Last Game Appearance of..."
AND clicking Back button should return user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue button should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: BOC receives error approving a tx with a placement date after current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to approve a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
AND "Placement Date" entered on the contract occurs after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check whether entered "Placement Date" occurs on or before current date
AND user should see error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC receives error approving a tx without entered comments to explain change in injury details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Place on 60 Day Concussion DL" transaction has been submitted to BOC
AND BOC has made changes to the Injury Details on the transaction after it was submitted 
AND BOC has not entered anything into the "Comments"
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user attempts to click "Approve" on the item
custom_expected:
THEN user will see error message "You must enter comments if updating Injury Details."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - User's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: Club basic - User's club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
AND user should not be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club admin
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User wants to view an existing Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a Player
AND Club or BOC user is attempting to view the transaction from a player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction should open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields should match data discovery (Note: if reinstatement is for player that was on concussion DL it is slightly different)
AND "Close" button is displayed on form
AND clicking "Close" button should return user to their entry point into the transaction

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Reinstate from DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load a new Preliminary transaction in edit mode

title: Submit a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful submit blue notification #76
AND players Pending MJ Roster Status should be set to Active
AND an entry should be created in green font in player's Player History: Code = REINS, Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
{Disabled List} should reference the player's latest DL placement (ex: 7-Day Concussion DL etc)
AND approval item should be generated and display on BOC - Major Transactions = Admin's Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should display in Comments column of Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open the Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Type hyperlink will open submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC user approves Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field, formatting, on Submit, and on Approve rules checks
AND once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status is updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History should be updated: Code = REINS Description = Reinstate From {Disabled List}, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND player's MJ roster status should be set to Active

title: BOC user rejects Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a club has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction to BOC for approval
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: Club user receives notification if tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Reinstate from DL" transaction reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification if tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Reinstatement from DL" transaction reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user receives notification if tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the transaction or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Reinstatement from DL" transaction reaches an "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Place on 60 Day DL" transaction in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Delete a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND the transaction is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this [Reinstatement from DL]?"
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the transaction
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted transaction should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: Reverse a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND any action items generated as a result of the transaction should be removed

title: Suppress a reversed Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Reinstatement from DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from the player's Player History 
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from an other place where it is visible on UI

title: BOC user wants to edit an existing Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: BOC user wants to see flags if certain rule checks fail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user has submitted a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
AND one or more flags is set for the form based on some rule violation
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the flag icon displayed on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should open a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form
AND flags should display on any Approvals Item generated for the transaction
AND if assignment will result in the player's Club exceeding their Active or Under Control limit, then the flag "Approving this transaction will exceed the Club's Active or Under Control limit." should be displayed
AND flags should be dismissed upon Approve or Reject of the transaction

title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction has been initiated for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected: THEN transaction should appear in current Pending Daily Transactions Bulletin as "Reinstated from {Disabled List}"

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx - preliminary or rejected tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected transaction already exists for the player from within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load existing transaction in edit mode

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx - submitted tx already exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted transaction already exists for the player from within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load existing transaction in view mode

title: User wants to create a new Reinstate from DL tx - (Concussion)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected reinstate from DL transaction exists for the player within the last 10 days
AND player was on DL for a concussion at ANY point since being placed on DL
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Reinstate from DL" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND clicking "Reinstate from DL" should load a new "Reinstatement for DL (Concussion)" form in edit mode

title: Reverse and suppress a Reinstate from DL tx - not most recent approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to reverse and suppress the transaction
AND grey "Reverse" button is displayed on the form
BUT selected transaction is not the most recent approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" button should close modal and return user to the transaction

title: User wants to cancel an existing Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

title: User wants to save an existing Reinstate from DL tx - tx in Post-Approval state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN required field and formatting checks should be run
AND transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: BOC user wants to edit an existing Reinstate from DL tx - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes

title: Club user wants to edit an existing Reinstate from DL tx - Preliminary and Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: Club user wants to edit an existing Reinstate from DL tx - All other States
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit any other part of the transaction

title: User wants to save an existing Reinstate from DL tx - First time saving tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: User wants to save an existing Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND transaction is not in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is approved- 26th man
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Reinstate from DL" transaction has been initiated for a player
AND "Return as 26th man" is checked on Reinstatement
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected: THEN transaction should appear in current Pending Daily Transactions Bulletin as "Reinstated from {Disabled List} as 26th man"

title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a previously approved "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN status of reinstatement is updated to "Reversed"
custom_expected:
THEN previous "Approved" bulletin entry should be removed
OR if the entry was on a previous bulletin, a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Reinstated From {Disabled List} - Reversed"

title: BOC wants an entry created on daily transaction bulletin when tx is reversed - 26th man
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a previously approved "Reinstate from DL" transaction exists for a player
AND "as 26th man" appeared on approval entry
custom_steps: WHEN status of reinstatement is updated to "Reversed"
custom_expected:
THEN previous "Approved" bulletin entry should be removed
OR if the entry was on a previous bulletin, a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Reinstated From {Disabled List} as 26th man - Reversed"

title: Club user prevented from creating a tx for a player that does NOT belong to same org
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND selected player's Current Org is not the same Org as the initiating user
custom_steps: WHEN initiating club user selects "Reinstate from DL" on the Create New menu from player's Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" button will return user to the entry point

title: Receive error attempting to reinstate player who is a MN league player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND selected player's pending roster (or current if pending unavailable) status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Reinstate from DL" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to point of entry

title: Club user receives error if they are reinstating a player that was on the DL for a concussion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND selected player has been placed on the DL for a concussion since his latest reinstate from DL transaction
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Reinstate from DL" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "Please contact the Office of the Commissioner. Only a BOC user can create a {Reinstate from DL} for a player that has been placed on the Disabled List due to a concussion."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the point of entry

title: Receive error attempting to reinstate player who is at MN league level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a completed "Reinstate from DL" transaction
AND selected player's Pending Roster status is at the Minor League
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking Back button will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Receive error if placement date is back dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if placement date is future dated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if user is submitting a tx without "Received Medical Director Approval" checkbox being checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND "Received Medical Director Approval" checkbox is displayed on the Reinstatement
AND "Received Medical Director Approval" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A player must have received Approval from a Medical Director to be reinstated from placement on the DL due to concussion."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if user is submitting a tx without "Received Return to Play Form" checkbox being checked
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstatement from DL" transaction 
AND "Received Return to Play Form" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A player must have received Approval to Return to Play to be reinstated from placement on the DL due to concussion."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive a warning if MJ League Club's active or under control limit will be exceeded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to inititate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND completion of the transaction would put the club over its under control and/or active roster limits
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display warning message: "The club [Major League club name] will exceed the Active List or Under Control limit.
Active Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]
Under Control Limit: [Limit #] Actual: [Actual#]"
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: Receive error if player has a pending or approved tx after the entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: Receive error if player does not have a valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction 
AND selected player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) major league roster status is not "7-Day Concussion", "15-Day DL", or "60-Day DL"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "The player must currently be on the Disabled List and not currently be on Rehab in order to be Reinstated."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: Receive error if entered reinstatement date is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to initiate a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND reinstatement date entered on the form is before the Earliest Reinstatement Date displayed on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message "The player cannot be reinstated before the earliest reinstatement date."
AND clicking "Back" button will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" will ignore the error and continue with the transaction

title: BOC user receives error if tx placement date is after the current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to approve a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
AND Placement Date on the transaction is after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN user should see error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Reinstate from DL" transaction for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - User's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: Club basic - User's Club is "From Org'' or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Reinstate from DL" transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - All transactions including other clubs and BOC only
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club admin
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
